creator: indrayanivaze@indiatimes.com
text:
Hello,

   I am using tomcat 3 on Red hat linux. Event though i chnaged the date&time 
from control panel in sbin/linuxconf, the changes are not reflectd on the time.
The date parameter is displayed properly as per changes but time is not 
disaplyed correctly

creator: sriramnrn@gmail.com
text: A question better asked on tomcat-user, since this is clearly a JVM/OS issue.
